name: Time Shenanigans
description:
Your spaceship has suddenly become stranded in space.  Your robot says that you already came up with a solution to this dilemma, but you don't recall coming up with one!  Now you and your robot have to work backwards to find out what your cunning plan is, uncovering some strange metaphysical mysteries along the way.

Time Shenanigans is an extremely short sci-fi visual novel about impossible timelines.  The player must puzzle out their predicament by asking their robot companion various questions, slowly uncovering the strange mystery that stranded them.

  • A sci-fi mystery parody featuring broken spaceships, time hiccups, and sassy robots
  • Work backwards through the story and uncover the proper order of events
